63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Sa`d bin Abi Waqqas:I have never heard the Prophet (ﷺ) saying about anybody walking on the earth that he is from the people of Paradise except `Abdullah bin Salam. The following Verse was revealed concerning him: "And a witness from the children of Israel testifies that this Qur'an is true

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنَاقِبُ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ سَلاَمٍ رضى الله عنه
chapter.eng-name: The virtues of ‘Abdullah bin Salam رضي الله عنه
